title: Uber Rides Analysis
desc: Comprehensive analysis of 150K+ Uber ride data identifying booking patterns, cancellation drivers, and revenue leakage points to optimize operational efficiency.

title: Hospital Wait-list Dashboard
desc: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard tracking patient wait times and departmental flow, enabling data-driven resource allocation and reducing operational bottlenecks.

title: HR Analytics Dashboard
desc: End-to-end HR analytics solution integrating Snowflake data with Tableau visualizations to monitor hiring metrics, employee retention, and cross-departmental performance.
